document.heading: Walker Jones/Northwest One Unity Health Center Tax Abatement Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-351, the “Walker Jones/Northwest One Unity Health Center Tax Abatement Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-917 which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 2, 2008, and December 16, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 15, 2009, it was assigned Act No. 17-685 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-351 became effective on March 25, 2009.
